name: Ride of the Headless Horsemen
description:
Made with Minxrod.

A short game in Pico-8 for the Fall 2021 Spartasoft game jam.

Players play in teams of two:

- A headless horseman who controls the character but cannot look at the screen

- A director who does not have a controller but guides the headless horseman

Up to 8 teams can play.

First to obtain the pumpkin head wins.
